KA.AQWE.content: will a law bring enlightenment? > PUBLIC vs. PRIVATE: private is where an official obeys a law and does not apply reason > thoughts against a law do not disrupt the law, one is still dutiful

KA.IUHCI.content: a state, through laws, can maintain itself automatically [?] > if one presumes all these events will result in nothing, that the species is just preparing us for a hell of evils

KA.EP.content: violation in one place—felt in all others

political prudence, agreement of politics w/ morals is possible only w/in a federative union > the 3 false politics: reservatio mentalis (interpret how you want), guessing at probabilities, peccatum philosophicum (good for world if big nation absorbs a small one
